industry: Non-profit Organizations and Primary and Secondary Education
description:
Fully remote licensed Therapist / Counselor opportunities. Great Full-time and Supplement Opportunity!

Licensed Therapist Details

  • 100% remote work
  • Client referrals
  • Therapy focused model with zero administrative work
  • 5-40 hrs per week - You decide your schedule

Licensed Therapist Compensation

  • First Client Bonus*
  • Up to $81,900* at 35 hrs per week
    • Paid out weekly
  • Benefits
    • $650 monthly Health Stipend*
    • Receive Free personal therapy with your account
    • Free access to CEUs
Licensed Therapist Requirements:

  • Active state license/s
  • Independent practice capability
  • Following credentials are accepted -Licensed Mental Health Counselor - LMHC
  • Licensed Clinical Social Worker - LCSW
  • Licensed Marriage and Family Therapist - LMFT
  • Licensed Marriage and Family Therapist - LMFT
  • Licensed Professional Counselor - LPC
  • Licensed Mental Health Professional - LMHP
  • Psychologist (PhD/PsyD)
